title: Morgana
body: Nerf Morgana root time and range please...

replies.body: You can nerf it yourself, if you get out of the way of it, which is easy considering how slow it is, you can reduce the damage and duration by 100%.

Remove the snare, add a stun of equal duration with a split like lissandra's q. 

Oh god I'm infected, I been indoctrinated.
Save the Snare for her W, and make it snare you for 1 second everytime it ticks.  o_o
